Question: This person then married Marcia Murphey, a production assistant; they also had two children, both sons, Jesse and Micah.
Hints: Kohs followed them for eight years and produced the film Song Sung Blue, but needed permission to use this person's songs.
His parents were Rose (née Rapaport) and Akeeba "Kieve" this person, a dry-goods merchant.
This person later followed with "Cherry, Cherry", "Kentucky Woman", "Thank the Lord for the Night Time", "Do It", and others.
